About Me
My name is Christian Copenhaver, I’ve been an Avid cannabis user since 2007, I've also been a prop 215 cardholder since 2008. I've always had high interest in the cannabis industry I’m a Massage Therapist which aides in the aspect of understanding patient services, patient care, as well as cannabis strains and cultivation to help certain pathologies in the body such as cancer, lupus, MS, etc. I’m current with local Cannabis law in california such as prop D complaints etc. I Have Cultivated my own cannabis, and disturbed my own cannabis.

Objectives
I’m Seeking a full time employment in the cannabis industry to utilize my customer service skills, utilize my cash handling skills, perfect and gain knowledge of cultivation, and assist the community in holistic healing. 

Skills
customer service skills, cash handling skills, previous managerial positions, retail & sales experience, loyal, trustworthy, dependable, clean & organized, knowledgeable about weight amounts, knowledgeable of mmj laws & props, knowledge of strain identification Indica/sativa/hybrid, knowledgeable of the effects of different strains/edibles/concentrates, self grower, self-motivated

Experience
-Have always had a job (Cashier, Managerial positions, Customer service jobs, etc.)
-Knowledge of the cannabis industry
-Reliable & Hard-Working
